meanings.definition: A type of entertainment or performance that serves as a contrast or foil to a masque.
meanings.sent1: The antimasque featured lively dances and humorous skits.
meanings.sent2: The audience eagerly awaited the antimasque after the grand masque performance.
meanings.sent3: During the antimasque, the actors comically stumbled over their lines, much to the delight of the spectators.
meanings.sent4: The antimasque was like a burst of colorful confetti amidst the elegant masque.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant costumes and energetic music made the antimasque unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A group of performers in an antimasque.
meanings.sent1: The antimasque consisted of talented singers and acrobats.
meanings.sent2: In the antimasque, each performer showcased their unique skills.
meanings.sent3: The antimasque group rehearsed tirelessly to perfect their synchronized routine.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the antimasque members was as strong as a chain link.
meanings.sent5: The applause for the antimasque performers echoed through the hall.
